title: accounts and passwords
body:

replies.body: What errors is it giving you?  We can also help with recovery directly through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Reach out to us through that, and our account team will be able to update your info and get the account back into your hands.
